query: {   allFactSheets(factSheetType: organization, first: 10000) {     pageInfo {       startCursor       endCursor       hasNextPage     }     totalCount     edges {       node {         ... on organization {           id           type           name           displayName           category           BusinessFunction: relToParent {             edges {               node {                 factSheet {                   name                 }               }             }           }           externalId {             externalId           }           tags {             name           }           subscriptions {             edges {               node {                 roles {                   name                 }                 user {                   displayName                   email                 }               }             }           }           lifecycle {             CurrentState: asString             phases {               Stage: phase               Date: startDate             }           }         }       }     }   } }
